divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog in Bucks County, PA. I saw a bright flash over the tree lines in my development. A smaller but still flickering, large, fast, fire like color lights almost like a flare but very worm-like appeared after the bright flash. It didn't fade and moved in an arc and then vanished. I was shocked and I have no idea what the heck it was. I thought it wa san explosion at fire=st but then the flickering lights appeared so I have no idea.
Summary: Bright Flash and the fluttering lights
